title: Householder operator
summary: In linear algebra, the Householder operator  is defined as follows. Let V {\displaystyle V\,} be a finite dimensional inner product space with inner product ⟨ ⋅ , ⋅ ⟩ {\displaystyle \langle \cdot ,\cdot \rangle } and unit vector u ∈ V {\displaystyle u\in V} . Then
